backend/main.mo: Defines user profile types, check‑in structures, feedback messages, and integrates access control within the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature report linking a login page UI update to specific files, components, and test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in UI, logic, and branding.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata, social previews, icons, and loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component orchestrating authentication, actor initialization, status loading, timeouts, and routing to login, onboarding, or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendDial: Dialog component showing backend or fallback brutal messages with controlled open/close behavior.
frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendFeed: Card fetching and displaying the latest brutal friend feedback with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/ChanceOfDrinking: Card showing a placeholder randomized risk level for drinking with themed styling and icons.
Computes days until Friday and next full moon and renders a card showing friendly and brutal messages about each.
frontend/src/components/DailyCheckInDial: Modal for daily check‑ins letting users report sobriety, drink count, and mood with validation and form reset.
frontend/src/components/DataLoggedDialog: Confirmation dialog showing a message and variant after logging or updating data.
frontend/src/components/DrinksChart.tsx: Builds a 14‑day drinks history bar chart with update animations and loading states.
frontend/src/components/FollowUpCheckInD: Dialog for follow‑up check‑ins allowing users to confirm remaining sober or log additional drinks.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: React error boundary that shows an error screen with reload option and error details.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header bar with app title and logout button.
frontend/src/components/MoodIndicator.ts: Displays the most recent mood metric with emoji and color styling.
frontend/src/components/MotivationButton: Renders a button that fetches a motivation message and shows it in a dialog with click limits.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingFlow.t: Implements a multi-step onboarding questionnaire and submits user profile data to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ProgressStats.ts: Displays sober day metrics with icons, handling loading and formatting numeric stats.
frontend/src/components/RepeatCheckInDia: Dialog guiding users through repeat check-ins, including sober confirmation or entering drink counts.
frontend/src/components/SoberDaysSection: Shows current sober streak and target progress using styled cards.
frontend/src/components/StatusIndicators: Calculates and displays daily and weekly drinking status based on chart data.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedHeaderSec: Combines latest feedback display with a motivation button and dialog handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user onboarding, profile, and check‑in data via the backend actor with retry logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind styles, BRUTAL theme color variables, typography, layout rules, and utility classes like neon glows and brutalist visuals.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI, loading identity, user data, metrics, and session flow logic to guide daily and follow‑up check‑ins.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with branding, animations, and a button that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/session/dailySessionFlow.ts: Implements a deterministic session-flow state machine that resolves the current phase and generates a modal queue, with helpers to start, advance, and update state messages.
frontend/src/utils/sobrietyDuration.ts: Parses sobriety duration text into a numeric day count with simple pattern checks and a 30‑day fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them for security.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, shadows, keyframes, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Captures the project’s current schema version, high‑level summary, and a list of implemented frontend and canister features with metadata.
